subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jia Perkins scored 24 points to lead the Chicago Sky to a 77-65 victory over the visiting Liberty, snapping a five-game losing streak. Chicago (13-19) was eliminated from playoff contention when Washington beat Connecticut earlier in the night.The Sky lost Chasity Melvin to an eye injury in the first quarter. Preliminary tests showed no loss of vision. Jessica Davenport scored 14 points for the Liberty (13-18), which is a game and a half behind the Mystics for the East’s fourth and final playoff berth.
